FromString.hpp

00001 #ifndef FROMSTRING_HPP_
00002 #define FROMSTRING_HPP_
00003 
00004 //Based on code from http://www.codeguru.com/forum/showthread.php?t=231054
00005 
00006 #include <string>
00007 #include <sstream>
00008 #include <iostream>
00009 
00010 #include <core/EString.h>
00011 
00012 // the third parameter of from_string() should be
00013 // one of std::hex, std::dec or std::oct
00015 
00023 template <class T> bool from_string(T& t, const std::string& s,std::ios_base& (*f)(std::ios_base&) = std::dec)
00024 {
00025         std::istringstream iss(s);
00026         return !(iss >> f >> t).fail();
00027 }
00029 
00037 //*
00038 template <class T> bool from_string(T& t, const EString& s,std::ios_base& (*f)(std::ios_base&) = std::dec)
00039 {
00040         std::istringstream iss(s.c_str());
00041         return !(iss >> f >> t).fail();
00042 }
00043 //*/
00044 #endif /*FROMSTRING_HPP_*/
